meaningMnemonic: If you follow the <kanji>law</kanji> of <kanji>rotation</kanji> while you play music you'll end up with a lovely <vocabulary>melody</vocabulary>. If you don't, you'll miss all the cues on beat that rotation gives you and it will sound like crap.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
